message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly this time. We both lose money with each round.
I'll take a bit more, consider the inflation loss
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but we need to come to an agreement before the money loses too much value.
Come on, I'm not getting any younger and neither is the money
We are losing a lot of value with each round. Let's make a deal, I'll take 60 and you can have 40. It's a better deal for both of us than continuing to reject offers.
